Founded by the National Park Service in 1935 & was
 		completed in 1965
 Tram Ride - $12
 Museum at the Gateway Arch - Free
 Helicopter Tours - $43

Saint Louis Zoo - Free Admission
 			Ride the Train, Watch the Sea Lion Show, Feed the
 			Stingrays, or Visit the Children's Zoo
 The Muny - Ticket Prices Vary ($0 to $110)
 Boathouse Paddle Co. - Prices Vary (AVG. $20 per hour)

Loop Trolley - $5 All Day Pass
 Fitz's - Known for their Root Beer & microbrewed soda
 The Pageant - St. Louis' premiere concert nightclub
 Blueberry Hill Resturant & Music Club 
 Tivoli Theatre - Features independent and foreign films

A mixture of playground, funhouse, and architectural marvel!
 		Single Day Admission - $16
 		Museum + Roof Admission - $22
 		Groups of 15 or More - $11 per person

Selling Frozen Custard for over 80 years
 Popular Menu Items: (AVG. $5)
 			Cardinal Sin (Tart Cherries & Hot Fudge)
 			Cookie Sandwich (With Dad's Oatmeal Cookies)
 			Turtle (Hot Fudge, Caramel, & Pecans)

Established in 1970, The Hill includes some of the
 finest Italian restaurants in the country
 Popular Restaurants:
 			Charlie Gitto's - Prices Vary (AVG. $20 to $30)
 			Zia's - Prices Vary (AVG. $11 to $30)
 			Guido's - Prices Vary (AVG. $11 to $30)

Family Owned & Operated since 1977
 Popular Menu Items: (AVG. $7)
 			Dad's Special (Hot Ham/Beef Dipped in Gravy)
 			Poor Boy (Ham, Salami, Mortadella, Cheese)
 			Mom's Special (Turkey, Ham, Roast Beef, 
 						Munchee Cheese, and Homemade 1000 Island)
